alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Jefferson (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 7:09PM CDT until June 15 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Milwaukee/Sullivan has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Jefferson County in southeastern Wisconsin... Dodge County in southeastern Wisconsin... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 709 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Columbus to near Marshall, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Watertown, Beaver Dam, Hartford, Mayville, Horicon, Waterloo, Juneau, Lomira, Theresa, Hustisford, Iron Ridge, Burnett, Ashippun, Rubicon, Lebanon, Woodland, Reeseville, Neosho, Richwood and Clyman. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for south central, southeastern and east central Wisconsin. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for south central, southeastern and east central Wisconsin.
